Michael ALESSIO
v.
I-FLOW CORPORATION, a/k/a I-Flow, LLC, Kimberly-Clark, a/k/a Kimberly-Clark Corporation, Seth R. Krum, D.O., Pennsylvania Orthopedic Associates, Inc., Richard Strulson, M.D. Petition of: Seth D. Krum, D.O., Pennsylvania Orthopedic Associates, Inc. Michael Alessio
v.
I-Flow Corporation, a/k/a I-Flow, LLC, Kimberly-Clark, a/k/a Kimberly-Clark Corporation, Seth R. Krum, D.O., Pennsylvania Orthopedic Associates, Inc., Richard Strulson, M.D. Petition of: Richard Strulson, D.O. No. 586 EAL 2017
No. 35 EAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. June 13, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 13th day of June, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
